name: The Guilt and the Shadow
description: "unbearable... this place stinks... i need to get out of here. the boat is waiting for me.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: 2.0ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: No controller support

reviews.review_text: Strong visiuals and great atmosphere, yet tedious puzzles and lackage of narrative. I would recommended it, but bear in mind that puzzles are not satisfying and the narrative is dull.
